meanings.definition: A brief statement or account of the main points of something.
meanings.sent1: She wrote summaries of the book to help her study.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the students to write summaries of the chapter.
meanings.sent3: The summaries she made were so short, they fit on a sticky note.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked like a machine, creating summaries of every conversation.
meanings.sent5: The summaries acted like a map, guiding her through the complex information.

meanings.definition: A summary of a text, speech, or other content.
meanings.sent1: The summaries provided a quick overview of the main ideas.
meanings.sent2: I always read the summaries before diving into the full article.
meanings.sent3: The summaries were like trailers for the full movies of information.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library, storing summaries of every lecture.
meanings.sent5: The summaries were like a flashlight in the dark, illuminating the key points.
